nodes.text: Ro-tuK was a droid of the Gree Enclave who lived during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Upon the reappearance of the ancient Gree starship Gray Secant, Ro-tuK invited members from both sides of the war to come to Ilum to assist the Gree in their experiments.

Ro-tuK first appeared in game update 1.7 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2013. He is only accessible through the Relics of the Gree event to both factions in the game.
